segments.en: “Mendicants, there are these four Dhamma speakers.

segments.pli: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco dhammakathiko appañca bhāsati asahitañca;
segments.en: One Dhamma speaker speaks little and off topic.

segments.pli: parisā cassa na kusalā hoti sahitāsahitassa.
segments.en: And their assembly can’t tell what’s on topic and what’s off topic.

segments.pli: Evarūpo, bhikkhave, dhammakathiko evarūpāya parisāya dhammakathikotveva saṅkhaṃ gacchati.
segments.en: Such an assembly regards such a Dhamma speaker simply as a Dhamma speaker.

segments.pli: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco dhammakathiko appañca bhāsati sahitañca;
segments.en: One Dhamma speaker speaks little but stays on topic.
And their assembly can tell what’s on topic and what’s off topic.

segments.pli: Evarūpo, bhikkhave, dhammakathiko evarūpāya parisāya dhammakathikotveva saṅkhaṃ gacchati.
segments.en: Such an assembly regards such a Dhamma speaker simply as a Dhamma speaker.

segments.pli: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco dhammakathiko bahuñca bhāsati asahitañca;
segments.en: One Dhamma speaker speaks much but off topic.

segments.pli: parisā cassa na kusalā hoti sahitāsahitassa.
segments.en: And their assembly can’t tell what’s on topic and what’s off topic.

segments.pli: Evarūpo, bhikkhave, dhammakathiko evarūpāya parisāya dhammakathikotveva saṅkhaṃ gacchati.
segments.en: Such an assembly regards such a Dhamma speaker simply as a Dhamma speaker.

segments.pli: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco dhammakathiko bahuñca bhāsati sahitañca;
segments.en: One Dhamma speaker speaks much and stays on topic.
And their assembly can tell what’s on topic and what’s off topic.

segments.pli: Evarūpo, bhikkhave, dhammakathiko evarūpāya parisāya dhammakathikotveva saṅkhaṃ gacchati.
segments.en: Such an assembly regards such a Dhamma speaker simply as a Dhamma speaker.
These are the four Dhamma speakers.”
